name: Surprise Party (David Blosser, Pamela Vargas)
description:
*Requires microphone to play!! (Allow Flash to access your mic!)

The patron deity of surprise birthday parties wants you to surprise your friend. Use your microphone to keep the others quiet until the perfect moment to yell "Surprise!". You don't want to make the deity angry with you...

Won first prize for the #1GAMCRUNCH game jam in May 2013. The theme was "Angry god" and the challenge was "No Touch", which means we couldn't click or tap for the main game mechanic.

Credits:
Pamela Vargas
David Blosser
